name: MayhemOverride
description:
THE 2 CHARACTERS ARE CONTROLLED BY TWO PLAYERS AS THEY GO TO THE 3 STAGES.

IT'S A GAME ABOUT MAKING YOUR OWN RULES WITH THE PERSON NEXT TO YOU, AND IT'S UPTO YOU WHETHER YOU WANT TO PLAY FAIR OR MAYBE BREAK A RULE.

FOR EXAMPLE, YOU COULD MAKE A RULE NOT TO USE THE NUMBER KEYS (WHICH SIMPLY KILLS A PLAYER RANDOMLY) BUT WON'T IT BE A BIT TEMPTING TO BE UNFAIR AND TRY YOUR LUCK WITH THE NUMBER KEYS? OR YOU COULD EVEN MAKE A RULE TO NOT DESTOY THE OTHER PLAYER BY ANY MEANS AND PLAY IT PEACEFULLY, IT'S UPTO YOU.

IF YOU FALL OFF, YOU TELEPORT TO SPAWN POINT WITHOUT ANY DAMAGE.
